message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. It's a good deal for both of us.  We can work out a better deal later.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give away 90% of the money. You can try to do better.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share. Let's split it 60/40. We can both get a decent amount this way.
I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give away more than 45% of the money. You're going to have to do better if you want more.
Let's meet in the middle. 55/45 split seems fair, considering the inflation. If we don't agree, we both risk losing even more.
